definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: Partners are less likely to feel ignored or disrespected.
sentences.chinese: 同伴也不容易感到被忽视或者不受尊重。

sentences.english: But scholars in the past neglected the foreign cultural factors when plot of a novel was conceived.
sentences.chinese: 而前贤忽视了这一有关构思根本的外来文化因子触媒。

sentences.english: Additive was an important for compound fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 添加剂是复混肥料中不可忽视的组分。

sentences.english: Men often overlook their ears during their regular grooming session.
sentences.chinese: 男人们在日常装扮中经常会忽视掉耳朵。

sentences.english: Flossing is probably skipped by the majority of men out there.
sentences.chinese: 至于牙线，更是被很多人忽视。

sentences.english: For one whole year Bill ignores the dog.
sentences.chinese: 整整一年，比尔忽视这个大丹犬。

sentences.english: That's why you should never consider it beneath you to revisit the moneymaking basics.
sentences.chinese: 因此你决不能忽视对盈利基本要素的再度审视。

sentences.english: The other utensils began to ignore the chopsticks.
sentences.chinese: 其他的用具开始忽视筷子。

sentences.english: It ignores one’s audience and waters down your message.
sentences.chinese: 它忽视了听众，也把要传达的信息大大冲淡。

sentences.english: It is hoped the move will boost research into neglected diseases.
sentences.chinese: 人们希望这一举动将推进被忽视疾病的研究。

sentences.english: Don't neglect the middles of tubes.
Reviewers tend to ignore video-on-demand releases.
sentences.chinese: 评论家倾向于忽视视频点播发布。

sentences.english: Don't take credit for anyone else's, but make sure you are not invisible.
sentences.chinese: 千万不要抢功，但也要保证你的工作不会被忽视。

sentences.english: This message is often overlooked while people bash other sins that are not as common.
sentences.chinese: 尽管人们往往忽视这个讯息打坏，不像其他罪常见。

sentences.english: Adequate rest is a largely ignored component of most athlete's training programs.
sentences.chinese: 充足的休息是被大多数体育训练计划忽视的一个部分。

sentences.english: Economists who ignore the recent rise in unemployment deserve to lose their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 忽视最近失业增加经济学家们，活该丢掉饭碗。

definition: to attach importance to sth/to value
to ignore/to neglect/to treat with contempt
treat sth lightly/to lower one's guard
usually/in many cases/more often than not
